department: Foreign Affairs, Trade And Development (Department Of)
short_summary: Cleaning services for the Embassy of Canada to Greece. This requirement is for routine cleaning services for the representational space, common areas and work spaces occupied by staff.
description: The Embassy of Canada to Greece requires routine cleaning services for its representational space, common areas and work spaces occupied by staff. The objective of this requirement is to provide cleaning services for the Embassy locations as per industry standards, thus, maintaining cleanliness and providing decent working conditions for the occupational gender eg workers male and employees female) based on gender equality and inclusivity perspective.
